name: Monktastic
description:
Step back in time to this nostalgic jungle themed game
Monktastic is a game for all ages.
Avoid obstacles, cocoa bullets, fire and much more
as you climb your way to the next level.

Key Features
----------------

Monktastic is platform based.

Collect the bananas to move to the next stage.

Avoid fire, cocoa bullets, saws and more.

Climb vines and ropes, jump to moving Platforms.

Nostalgic gameplay setting.
